title: Barry Goupe - In the Midst of Lies
description: A poor kid in a new town, Barry Goupe is befriended by the most affluent kid at school. Barry struggles with the motive behind this friendship as his new friend is arrested for an international crime. Was the purpose of this friendship sincere or did the wealthy boy mean to frame Barry for his own gain â€“ perhaps there is another truth? Running from the law, he learns he can trust only two people. In this fast-paced page turner, find out how Barry discovers his faith in God while digging for the truth about this wealthy family.
author: Sean P. McClure
